ccl.id AS ccl_id, ccl.coupon_id AS ccl_coupon_id, ccl.name AS ccl_name, ccl.type AS ccl_type, ccl.condition_amount AS ccl_condition_amount, ccl.pay_type AS ccl_pay_type, ccl.pay_amount AS ccl_pay_type, ccl.launch_num AS ccl_launch_num, ccl.max_receive AS ccl_max_receive, ccl.remain_num AS ccl_remain_num, ccl.launch_start_time AS ccl_launch_start_time, ccl.launch_end_time AS ccl_launch_end_time, ccl.effective_start_time AS ccl_effective_start_time, ccl.effective_end_time,ccl.review_status AS ccl_review_status, ccl.review_info AS ccl_review_info, ccl.confirm_flag AS ccl_confirm_flag, ccl.forbid_flag AS ccl_forbid_flag, ccl.confirm_time AS ccl_confirm_time, ccl.forbid_time AS ccl_forbid_time, ccl.last_update AS ccl_last_update, ccl.delete_flag AS ccl_delete_flag, ccl.delete_time AS ccl_delete_time
mapper.select: SELECT cc.count FROM ( SELECT *,count(*) AS count FROM card_coupon WHERE delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC ) cc LEFT JOIN card_coupon_launch ccl ON cc.id = ccl.coupon_id and ccl.delete_flag = 0 and ccl.confirm_flag = 1 AND ccl.review_status = 1 LEFT JOIN card_third_party_shop cts ON cts.id = cc.thirdparty_shop_id AND cts.delete_flag = 0

SELECT , ccss.store_id AS ccss_store_id, ccss.ratio AS ccss_ratio, ccvs.vip_type AS ccvs_vip_type, ss.name AS ccss_shop_name, ss.sub_commercial_type_name AS ccss_sub_commercial_type_name, cts.name AS thirdparty_shop_name FROM card_coupon cc LEFT JOIN card_coupon_store_scope ccss ON ccss.coupon_id = cc.id AND ccss.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN card_coupon_vip_scope ccvs ON ccvs.coupon_id = cc.id AND ccvs.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_shop ss ON ss.id = ccss.store_id AND ss.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN card_third_party_shop cts ON cts.id = cc.thirdparty_shop_id AND cts.delete_flag = 0 WHERE cc.id = #{id} AND cc.delete_flag = 0
